name: Ants of Duty
description: Ants of Duty is a strategy game about managing a small colony of ants that find themselves in an unknown territory. You have to help them cope with the huge dangers on their way, such as red ants, wasps and crabs, so that the ants find their way back to their home. Get resources, build an army and defeat enemies.Особенности: a game for the speed of development of the colony, many different opponents, a game with a choice of consequences.
